body: K so this is how this game works. Say I say "I blow up the person below" then the person to comment next would have to say how they survived it and come up with something to do the  next user to comment. Example:User 1: "I stabbed the user below with a knife"User 2: "I had armour on underneath my clothes,I throw a grenade at the user below" and so on. Ill start:"I hide poison in the meal of the user below"
